subdisciplines.name: Sociology of Crime and Deviance
subdisciplines.description: The study of how social structures and social inequality contribute to criminal behavior and deviant acts.

subdisciplines.name: Sociology of Law Enforcement
subdisciplines.description: The study of the role of law enforcement in society, including the training and organization of police forces, the impact of police on communities, and the use of force.

subdisciplines.name: Sociology of Courts and Legal Systems
subdisciplines.description: The study of the role of courts and legal systems in society, including the analysis of court decisions, litigation, and the development of legal institutions.
